channel.title: Adding prayer altar on a 508!
channel.description:
ok so im using the source davidscape 508 everything is great and i love it its online 24/7 but a few players and myself noticed i dont have an altar at home to recharge prayer we only have ancients and guthix altars can anyone tell me what .java or what .cfg to look for to add more objects like an altar
deob: 508
source: Davidscape
Original Source: Bulby
